H0.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. Ernest Hemingway

H1.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. F. Scott Fitzgerald

H2.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. William Faulkner

H3.text: Who wrote Of Mice and Men. Steinbeck

A4.text: Of Mice and Men is a 1937 tragic novel that Steinbeck rewrote as a play that same year.

A5.text: John Ernst Steinbeck... authored 33 books, with one book coauthored alongside Edward Ricketts, including 16 novels, six non-fiction books, and two collections of short stories. He is widely known for... Of Mice and Men (1937).
